DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether real-time functional magnetic resonance imaging may be a viable treatment for chronic pain in the future.
DOC.brief_title: Real-Time fMRI Feedback Effects on Pain Perception
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults ages 1865 Clinical depression Anxiety Substance dependence or chronic pain Ferrous metal implants Cardiac pacemakers or other implanted medical devices that might be adversely impacted by the MRI scanner magnetic field
